Package View

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
View.ClientView
public class ClientView extends Object
Class name: ClientView Methods list: initGameDialog, initGUI, initClientFrame, dialogs, and getter and setters Constant list: mainBGColor Purpose: ClientView class sets all the GUI for the client using Swing
Since:
JavaSE-17
Version:
03 Dec 2022
Author:
Amy Fujimoto
See Also:
  • javax.swing

      Parameters:

      private void initGUI()
      Method name: initGUI Purpose: Adds multiple panel and menu bar to the main frame of the client view Algorithm: Initializes the each panels by setting background and bounds and adds it to the main frame

    • textInputDialog

      public void textInputDialog(int dim)
      Method name: textInputDialog Purpose: Display a prompt for use to enter a text for game buttons Algorithm: Message with JOptionPane showInputDialog method and saves the text in the model if the text is appropriate length, otherwise it will prompt an error dialog
      Parameters:
      dim - Dimension of the new game
